content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ricston obtains most of your personal data through the forms and applications that you fill out in connection with your employment or its termination, for example, if you fill out a job application. In addition, Ricston may obtain personal data about you from other sources, but only to the extent permitted by the laws of Malta. \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
